content: As a developer focused on the backend and rarely delving into the design world, this was a very simple and effective example that makes perfect sense to me. I don’t like designing, but it seems incredibly important that a team of designers are all on the same page. For the same reason coders have style guides and linters to ensure the code is clean and maintainable, why wouldn’t designers follow the same pattern? I will definitely be bringing this to my teams. Thanks!
